Research

Currently I am working with the following PhD, MSc and BSc Students. If you are interested in collaborating on a topic related to my work please get in touch.

  • Generative Adversarial Networks
  • Explainable Artificial Intelligence
  • FAIR AI

Affective Computing

  • Multi-modal systems for human affect
  • Applied psychology (Personality, Emotion, Goal-setting)
